actions.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: \   SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to provide credits or credit guarantees for agricultural commodities provided for use in Iraq in violation of subsection (e) or (f) of section 202 of the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 (7 U.S.C. 5622).
purpose: An amendment numbered ten printed in the Congressional Record which seeks to prohibit use of funds from being used to provide credits or credit guarantees for agricultural commodities provided for use in Iraq in violation of subsection (e) or (f) of section 202 of the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978.
